ðŸ“– Summary: Clearcam turns RTSP-enabled cameras or old iPhones into AI security cameras with object detection, tracking, and mobile notifications. It allows users to self-host a network video recorder (NVR) with inference capabilities, view live camera feeds remotely, receive notifications on detected events, and view event clips with end-to-end encryption.
